iterations.text: Task 4.1: Epics::CreateFromManualSpec Interaction - Create working interaction class to create Epic with tasks from console. Test with tasks array and verify task positions. Reference: @spec-orchestrator.md
Task 4.2: Tasks::UpdateStatus Interaction - Create status update interaction with logging and broadcasting. Test task status updates and debug log appending. Reference: @spec-orchestrator.md
Task 4.3: Epics::Start Interaction - Create interaction to start epic manually from console. Test epic status changes and first task job enqueuing. Reference: @spec-orchestrator.md
